Package org.neuroph.nnet.flat

Provides Neuroph connectors to Encog engine, for high performance learning rules.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
FlatNetworkLearning Learning rule for flat networks.
FlatNetworkPlugin The FlatNetworkPlugin allows a Neuroph multi-layer-perceptron to make use of the Encog Engine.
FlatWeight A subclass of the Weight class.
 

Enum Summary
FlatLearningType These are the training methods provided by the flat network.
 

Package org.neuroph.nnet.flat Description

Provides Neuroph connectors to Encog engine, for high performance learning rules.
